name: boatmatey-monorepo
description: Root package for BoatMatey. Develop in web/, then sync to android/ and ios/.

scripts.build:cloudflare: cd web && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.deploy:cloudflare: npm run build:cloudflare && npx wrangler pages deploy web/dist --project-name=boatmatey
scripts.cap:android: npm run build && npx cap copy android
scripts.cap:ios: npm run build && npx cap copy ios
